home_header_description: Pesquisarr is a simple tool to help you find torrents without distractions.
home_header_scammy_sites_description: There are many scammy sites that promise what they don't deliver. This tool focuses on what matters.
home_header_skip_sites_description: We skip irrelevant sites so you get the best content.
home_header_pure_gold_description: What you get is pure gold.
home_header_cloudflare_limits_descriptio: It may not show many results due to platform limitations.
